entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then southeast 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Freezing rain inland late in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
